channel.title: Our Packs on Carry On Round The World
channel.description: Recent content in Our Packs on Carry On Round The World

item.title: Paul's Travel Pack
item.description: This page shows what is in Paul’s pack for travel. It is generated using lighterpack.com which is a great way to organize your packing lists for various activities. You can see his Pacific Crest Trail load out here and his Annapurna Circuit load out here.
